headline: Robinhood joining S&P 500, Broadcom & OpenAI, Duolingo coverage
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the addition of Robinhood Markets (HOOD), Applovin (APP), and EMCOR (EME) to the S&P 500 (^GSPC) starting September 22; Broadcom (AVGO) inking a $10 billion AI chip deal with OpenAI; and Wells Fargo initiating coverage on Duolingo stock (DUOL). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: AppLovin Hits New Milestone With S&P 500 Debut Fueling Market Buzz
summary: AppLovin Corp. (NASDAQ:APP) shares jumped over 11% after S&P Dow Jones Indices said the company will be added to the S&P 500. S&P Dow Jones Indices announced late Friday that AppLovin Corp., Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD), and Emcor Group Inc. (NYSE:EME) will join the S&P 500 as part of its quarterly rebalance. The changes will take effect before markets open on September 22. The three new additions will replace MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (NYSE:MKTX), Caesars Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:CZR)

headline: AppLovin (APP) Valuation in Focus Following S&P 500 Index Inclusion Announcement
summary: If you are watching AppLovin (APP) right now, you could hardly miss the news. This mobile app monetization company has been tapped to join the S&P 500 Index, with the addition set for September 22. S&P 500 inclusion tends to pull in demand from index-tracking funds and often sparks increased attention from institutional investors. For anyone considering their next move in the stock, this represents a meaningful event that can shift both near-term trading and longer-term perceptions of...

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Robinhood, EchoStar, Tesla, AppLovin
summary: ↗️ Robinhood (HOOD): The online retail brokerage, plus AppLovin (APP), are set to join the S&P 500 on Sept. 22, the index's compiler said late Friday. Both stocks rallied Monday morning. ↗️ Nutanix (NTNX): The cloud-computing company will enter the S&P MidCap 400 at the same time.
